data.eml:eml: First confirmed species record of Hydroscaphidae from Peru: description of a new species of Yara Reichardt and Hinton, and key to species (Coleoptera: Hydroscaphidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Trujillo, Gabriel A., Cañote, Javier (2019): First confirmed species record of Hydroscaphidae from Peru: description of a new species of Yara Reichardt and Hinton, and key to species (Coleoptera: Hydroscaphidae). Zootaxa 4638 (3): 344-350, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4638.3.2
